channel.title: Posts on My Summer in Spain
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Summer in Spain

item.title: My First Post
item.description: After 20 hours of travel, I finally arrived in Lisbon for the next 7 weeks of my summer. We arrived at the hotel at 11:00am, and after some quick unpacking, we immediately set out to explore Lisbon. The first weekend was spent walking around this incredibly hilly city and trying amazing, tiny restaurants.
